name: addMembersToCallQueue
description:
Add phone users and/or [common area phones](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360028516231-Managing-Common-Area-Phones) as members to a specific Call Queue.

**Prerequisites:**
* Pro or higher account plan. * Zoom Phone license
**Scopes:** `phone:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

callQueueId.description: Unique Identifier of the Call Queue.

members.description: A maximum of 10 members can be added at a time.

common_area_phone_ids.description: Array of one or more Common Area Phone Ids of the Common Area Phone(s) that you would like to add to the Call Queue.

id.description: User ID: Unique Identifier of the user.
